direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods are part of the iteration process and work closely together to manage the state of the iteration.
Both methods interact with the current iterator and manage the state of the iteration, though they perform different operations.
Both methods involve recursive iteration and state management, with findNext being a helper method for next.
Both methods handle the iteration process, with findNextByIterator being a specialized version of findNext for iterators.
